PropertyList.title: Catalina PBY6 Water bomber

key.name: Space or "s" (if your keyboard.xml has been updated from CVS)
l (like "l"etter)
key.desc: release water over your target (water bombing)

key.name: L
key.desc: ask for water loading when ready

key.name: B
key.desc: toggle ON/OFF Brake Parking on ground or ON/OFF Cables/Anchor on water

PropertyList.text:
========================================= That Model is the Catalina PBY6 converted to be a water bomber It was in use in the south-east of France from 1964 to 1970 =========================================
START and STOP ROUTINE To start the engines =>increase magneto switch and electric master switch "on" ( key name "}") => start engines ( key "space" or "s" of you have a recent FlightGear version) then take off
To take off =>Unlock Brake parking (shift B) =>Push the throttle to maximum When speed 70 knots pull the stick The aircraft will take off
To stop the engines =>decrease magneto switch and electric master switch "off" ( key name "{")
WATER BOMBER You mays simulate the filling of the water tank ( 4000 liters) when =>on the water, you want the floats DOWN (key"f") =>prepare the filling (command key "L") => a speed minimum of 55 kts The filling duration time is 100 sec. Control your speed which must be more than 55 kts (if less it does not fill) More is better, you may slide over the water touching it at 90 kts When loading, the aircraft is getting more and more heavy. When loaded the weight of the aircraft is heavier of 4000 kg , remember it when taking off After take off don't forget, you want the floats UP (key"f")
Now you may simulate a water bombing => At a low agl, (let's say 200 ft) and over the target which is supposed to be bombed, => release the water (command key 'l" like "l"etter) The water can be seen falling down.
The aircraft is right now 4000 kg less , it will suddenly jump upper in the sky, be prepared for it.
You may again, go back on the sea and fill again, that process is repeatable as long as you wish it.
